temperature.docs:
The information for the Temperature sensor.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [EE895 CO₂, Temperature and Pressure Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ee895.html#configuration-variables)*

co2.docs:
The information for the CO₂ sensor.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [EE895 CO₂, Temperature and Pressure Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ee895.html#configuration-variables)*

pressure.docs:
The information for the Pressure sensor.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [EE895 CO₂, Temperature and Pressure Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ee895.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [EE895 CO₂, Temperature and Pressure Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ee895.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x5F`.

*See also: [EE895 CO₂, Temperature and Pressure Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ee895.html#configuration-variables)*
